scripts.setup: yarn && yarn clean:lib && lerna bootstrap && yarn setup:all
scripts.preversion: yarn setup && yarn workspaces run validate
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules ad-tag/node_modules modules/**/node_modules utils/**/node_modules moli-release/node_modules moli-debugger/node_modules
scripts.clean:lib: rm -rf ad-tag/lib modules/**/lib utils/**/lib moli-release/lib moli-debugger/lib
scripts.github:publish: yarn clean:lib && yarn lerna run make:nodemodule && yarn lerna publish from-package --registry https://npm.pkg.github.com/
